page.title: 12Totton & Eling Council
page.content:
The chairman of the Totton & Eling District Council said that she became a councillor because a boy got killed by a train. She wanted to put up a fence but the railway would not put one up so thats why she became a councillor. She thought the only way get something done was to be a councillor & do something about it yourself.
She started being a councillor when she was 28 but you can start when you're 18. She had been run over on her way to a safety meeting, crossing on a zebra crossing. The other people at the meeting thought it was amusing.
